Package.Description:
Professional Geomatics software for Windows, Linux, and macOS.
Features: • Import/Export (DXF, Shapefile, CSV, GeoJSON) • COGO Calculations (Polars, Joins, Intersections) • Network Adjustments (GNU Gama) • Volumetric Calculations • Cross-platform support
Developed by Eineva Incorporated https://sitesurveyor.dev
